caseTitle: Taisei Corporation Tokyo Japan thr. its Attorney v. A.M. Construction Company (Pvt) Ltd. thr. its Chief Executive
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline:
(i) Minimal interference and support for the arbitration by the courts as an alternate mode of dispute resolution, underlined. (ii) Pro-enforcement bias of the New York Convention for enforcing foreign awards, explained. (iii) The definition of “foreign arbitral award” provided in the Recognition and Enforcement of Arbitration Agreement and
Foreign Award Act 2011, interpreted. (iv) Retrospective applicability of the 2011 Act to arbitration agreements and foreign awards, expounded.
